message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to negotiate a good deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit more than $95. I'm now offering the product for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not quite ready to let it go for $100. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but that's as low as I can go. I'm counting on making a profit, after all!
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.

Bob, I've already rejected your offer at $100, and I'm not going to budge from $105. I'm starting to think that you're not serious about buying this product. If you're not willing to meet me at $105, I'm going to have to consider other options. Let me think for a moment...
